summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 1, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 1, being the alley between 11th Avenue North and 12th Avenue North, and extending from East Aloha Street to the north line of lots 5 and 21 of said block, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8733 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
